      Boolean getCanRemove()

      Deprecated. 
      As of September 5, 2012, Facebook is changing over to like_count, so this method will be replaced by likeCount.

      Text contents of the comment.
      Boolean getUserLikes()
      This field is returned only if the authenticated user likes this comment
